--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> OOC: Okay, well Beachcomber is a Minibot, around 5 feet, so holding 
you
> up was a strain.

    OOC: LOL...Gawd..what a funny sight that'd be!!


> 
> BIC:
> <Sense of humor> he thought to himself. He much rather have that 
beside
> him than a killing machine. Ironically in the war, there was many
> Autobots, who were both. He remembered back, Trailbreaker, 
Bluestreaks,
> Sideswipe. All of them didnt want to be warriors, they had to. 
Others,
> just didnt have the make to be a warrior. Poor Firedrill, decked out
> with some very heavy Firepower, but I would be suprised if he ever 
used
> it to kill, he thought, what sweet sorrow, Beachcomber thought, 
curling
> his lip at the bitter words he thought, he looked up. Beachcomber 
rubbed
> the back of his head. He held up his hand, " I'm Beachcomber, and to
> tell you the truth, I enjoy good company, and exploring this kind of
> nature." he said, spinning around, showing off the sunrise, the 
prairy."

::REDHOT::

    The Seeker follow the Autobot's gaze into the sky. 
    "Heh...yeah." he said with a smirk. "The one... t...thing that 
never... s..surprise..s me is.." He caughed, and flinched. His 
injuries made him very uncomfortable. "N..no matter 
where...you..g..go...nature..always..is...beautiful." 
    His eyes took on a gleeful gleam. 
    "And a..nice flight...at da..dawn...with your..lover is..." He 
simply grinnned wider and growled suggestively. He chuckled to 
himself.


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
